v.

v.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc., a Delaware Corporation and Sam's Club, an Operating Segment of Wal-Mart Stores, Inc., Respondents Dolores Hummel, on Behalf of Herself and All Others Similarly Situated, Petitioner
v.
Wal-Mart Stores, Inc., a Delaware Corporation, and Sam's Club, an Operating Segment of Wal-Mart Stores, Inc., Respondents No. 327 EAL 2018
No. 328 EAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. December 27, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
